Paa Kofi Ansong bụ onye Ghana bichemist, ọchụnta ego na onye ọchụnta ego Ọ bụ onye nchoputa na onye isi oche nke venture capital group INVESTRADE INTERNATIONAL Ọ na-eje ozi na ọtụtụ bọọdụ Ghana gụnyere onye isi Adehyeman Savings and Loans Company Ltd A họpụtara ya na kansụl steeti na February 2017.

Paa Kofi Ansong gara Mahadum nke Ghana wee gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere Bachelor of Science na biochemistry. Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum, ọ gara mpụga Ghana ma rụọ ọrụ na mbụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka njikwa mma na Boots Pharmacy na United Kingdom. Mgbe ọ laghachiri Ghana, ya na enyi ya Kwadwo Amoafo guzobere ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ego, Investrade International Company Limited, n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 1993. Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onyeisi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
N'ihi ahụmịhe ya na ego na njikwa onwe ya, ọ na-eje ozi n'ọtụtụ bọọdụ ụlọ ọrụ gafee mba ahụ
Ha gụnyere Adehyeman Savings and Loans Company Ltd, St
Roses Secondary School na Akwatia, Ghana National Procurement Agency na Abossey Okai Spare Parts Association.

N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2017, Onye isi ala Nana Akuffo-Addo họpụtara ya na kansụl ahụ. N'oge emume iyi e mere na Flagstaff House, Onye isi ala Akuffo-Addo rịọrọ kansụl ka ha dọọ ya ọdụ nke ọma na ebumnuche nke ịkwalite Ghana mgbe niile. N'oge emume inyefe nnọkọ nke isii nke kansụl ahụ na nke asaa, onye isi oche kansụl na-apụ apụ, Naa Prọfesọ
Nabila, dụrụ ụlọ ọhụrụ ahụ ọdụ ka ha nye gọọmentị ọhụrụ ndụmọdụ kachasị mma iji hụ na mba ahụ na ụmụ amaala ya niile ga-ebi na ọganihu na udo.
